description: Number of planted noncrossing bushes with n nodes; i.e. rooted noncrossing trees with n nodes, root degree 1 and no nonroot nodes of degree 1.
links: Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: Sum((-1)^(n-k)*2^(n-k)*binomial(n, k)*binomial(3*k-2, k-1), k=1..n)/n; G.f.: satisfies A^3 + 2 z A^3 - 2 A^2 - 4 z A^2 + A + 2 z A - z = 0
author: _Emeric Deutsch_
